name: Super All-In!
text: Return 1 Synchro Monster you control to the Extra Deck, and if you do, Special Summon 4 "Flower Cardian" monsters from your GY, then draw 1 card, and if you do, show it, then, if it is a "Flower Cardian" monster, you can Special Summon it, ignoring its Summoning conditions. Otherwise, destroy as many monsters you control as possible, and if you do, halve your LP. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card is in the GY because it was sent there by a "Flower Cardian" monster's effect this turn: You can add 1 Spell/Trap from your GY to your hand.
